name: terminal-cheat-sheet
title: Terminal Cheat Sheet
description: Quick reference for essential bash keyboard shortcuts and terminal commands
author: asaf_ofer

commands.name: view-cheat-sheet
commands.title: View Cheat Sheet
commands.description: Browse terminal keyboard shortcuts and commands

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
